snippet: William M. Daley, a former chief of staff to President Obama, announced that he was exploring a bid for governor, setting up a possible fight with Gov. Pat Quinn for the Democratic nomination next year.
abstract: William M. Daley, a former chief of staff to President Obama, announced that he was exploring a bid for governor, setting up a possible fight with Gov. Pat Quinn for the Democratic nomination next year.

headline.main: In Illinois, Daley Exploring a Run for Governor
